title: [bug]: resources map unintuitively becomes directory

labels.name: status: needs triage
labels.description: This issue needs to triage, applied to new issues

body:
### Describe the bug

The following config:

```json
{
  "bundle": {
    "resources": {
      "../resources/user.json": "resources/user.json"
    }
  }
}
```

Results in:

```
src-tauri/
├─ target/
│  ├─ debug/
│  │  ├─ resources/
│  │  │  ├─ user.json/
│  │  │  │  ├─ user.json
```

### Reproduction

```bash
$ cargo create-tauri-app --beta
  my-app
$ cd my-app
$ mkdir resources
$ touch resources/user.json
$ nano src-tauri/tauri.conf.json
  {
    "productName": "my-app",
    "version": "0.0.0",
    "identifier": "com.my-app.www",
    "build": {
      "beforeDevCommand": "npm run dev",
      "devUrl": "http://localhost:1420",
      "beforeBuildCommand": "npm run build",
      "frontendDist": "../dist"
    },
    "app": {
      "windows": [
        {
          "title": "superboard",
          "width": 800,
          "height": 600
        }
      ],
      "security": {
        "csp": null
      }
    },
    "bundle": {
      "active": true,
      "targets": "all",
      "icon": [
        "icons/32x32.png",
        "icons/128x128.png",
        "icons/128x128@2x.png",
        "icons/icon.icns",
        "icons/icon.ico"
      ],
      "resources": {
        "../resources/user.json": "resources/user.json"
      }
    }
  }
$ cargo tauri dev
```

### Expected behavior

```
src-tauri/
├─ target/
│  ├─ debug/
│  │  ├─ resources/
│  │  │  ├─ user.json
```

### Full `tauri info` output

```text
[✔] Environment
    - OS: Ubuntu 22.4.0 X64
    ✔ webkit2gtk-4.1: 2.44.2
    ✔ rsvg2: 2.52.5
    ✔ rustc: 1.78.0 (9b00956e5 2024-04-29)
    ✔ cargo: 1.78.0 (54d8815d0 2024-03-26)
    ✔ rustup: 1.27.1 (54dd3d00f 2024-04-24)
    ✔ Rust toolchain: stable-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu (environment override by RUSTUP_TOOLCHAIN)
    - node: 22.2.0
    - pnpm: 9.1.1
    - npm: 10.7.0
    - bun: 1.1.0

[-] Packages
    - tauri [RUST]: 2.0.0-beta.22
    - tauri-build [RUST]: 2.0.0-beta.17
    - wry [RUST]: 0.40.1
    - tao [RUST]: 0.28.1
    - tauri-cli [RUST]: 2.0.0-beta.14
    - @tauri-apps/api [NPM]: 2.0.0-beta.13
    - @tauri-apps/cli [NPM]: 2.0.0-beta.14

[-] App
    - build-type: bundle
    - CSP: unset
    - frontendDist: ../dist
    - devUrl: http://localhost:1420/
    - framework: React
    - bundler: Vite
```


### Stack trace

_No response_

### Additional context

If this **is** the expected behaviour, then these docs are misleading: https://v2.tauri.app/develop/resources/
